services.name: EVE Online SSO and ESI
services.purpose: Authentication and character fitting data access.
services.requiredNotice: EVE Online and the EVE logo are the registered trademarks of CCP hf. All rights are reserved worldwide.
services.notes: This project is not endorsed by CCP.

services.name: EVE Image Server
services.purpose: Ship, item, and portrait images used in the UI.
services.notes: Image usage follows CCP third-party developer terms.

services.name: EVE Ref Reference Data API
services.purpose: Type, group, and metadata lookups used for fitting classification and naming.
services.notes: Used as a reference-data source to complement ESI.

services.name: Janice
services.purpose: Fitting appraisal and ISK estimate calculations.
services.notes: Accessed through Janice API endpoints configured by API key.

resources.name: Kaltekar (EVE Online)
resources.purpose: Landing page background image subject and universe attribution.
resources.notes: Landing hero image attributed to Kaltekar from EVE Online.

resources.name: EVE Online
resources.purpose: Game universe, names, and mechanics represented by fitting data.
resources.notes: All EVE intellectual property remains owned by CCP.

resources.name: CCP Third Party Developer License Agreement
resources.purpose: Legal terms for EVE API and related asset usage.
resources.notes: Legal requirements are reflected in attribution notices.
